reference_summary:
BUTEFO 4 Pack Shower and Bath Set with Natural Boar Bristles Bath Brush, Pumice Stone Brush for Foot Callus, Dry Brush SPA Massage for Cellulite and Lymphatic, Natural Loofah Sponge for Women Kids
BUTEFO
{'Material': 'Sponge', 'Brand': 'BUTEFO', 'Power Source': 'Hand_powered', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Massaging,Tightening,Exfoliating', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '14.29 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 13.44 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'BUTEFO'}
I was really excited to have this back brush. But when I went to put it together it didn’t go... no matter how hard I tried! That was upsetting. I had to get my dremel out to sand it down so it fit better and it’s still not all the way on. With that said, the brush is super nice and scratchy on the back. And the foot brush/pumice stone is really nice too! I hope your brush combo has less flaws.
Didn’t fit
Training Head Hairdressing Head Rainbow Synthetic Fiber Hair 24inch Mannequin Cosmetology Manikin Dolls Head for Hairdresser Styling Practicing with Free Clamp + DIY Hair Styling Braid Set
SENSAIRUITE
{'Brand': 'SENSAIRUITE', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '24 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 6.93 x 6.5 inches; 1.83 Pounds'}
[[VIDEOID:3e9a0a4c1e05b8d79256b9b63cdd466f]] One of the main reasons I got this head was to use hot tools on it to practice before I used them on me. IT DOES NOT CURL!!!! It says that it does, but it doesn’t. I have tried 3-4 different hot tools and it won’t hold a curl at all. The hair is soft, it’s very thick. So if you wanted it just to do some braiding, it would work well for that. Not happy.
DOES NOT CURL!!!!

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Interaction**: Continues to engage with personal care products, particularly in bath and shower accessories, hairdressing tools, and manicure sets. The latest purchase highlights a strong preference for multifunctional tools that combine aesthetic appeal with practicality.
- **Quality Expectations**: Maintains high standards for product functionality and usability, showing satisfaction with tools that are easy to use and well-made, while expressing discontent previously with assembly issues. Recent interactions emphasize a preference for reliable products that excel in performance.
- **Material Preference**: Remains interested in both natural and synthetic materials, with a continued focus on eco-friendly and sustainable options, evident in past behavior.
- **Product Benefits**: Seeks products that offer multifaceted benefits, especially those enhancing grooming skills and personal styling, reflecting a trend toward comprehensive care solutions.
- **User Experience**: Exhibits a hands-on, practical approach, enjoying products that are easy to handle, modify, and optimize for personal use. The latest review underscores an appreciation for travel-friendly items and efficient design.
- **Target Audience**: Emphasizes a family-oriented mindset, with an interest in tools suitable for children while prioritizing specialized personal grooming tools.
- **Overall Sentiment**: Displays a generally positive outlook towards products, increasingly favoring items that deliver efficiency, usability, and appealing design elements in personal care routines.
